fxInfo_clarification: These are measures placed on the ballot through a citizen petition process, not by the legislature or the executive. They may concern either the rejection of a recently approved law or a bill discussed in parliament. (They do not include recall elections.)
fxInfo_notes: Converted from (B) to (A) coding by David Altman.
fxInfo_ordering: If no legal provision exists (option 0), skip to question "Occurrence of plebiscite this year" [v2ddyrpl].
fxInfo_question: Is there legal provision for referendums?

fxInfo_responses.value: Allowed but non-binding (or with an intervening institutional veto).
